languages.text: Отставить огонь, повредим десятину! Он обездвижен, позже возьмем его на абордаж!

traits.locale_text: Отставить огонь, повредим десятину! Он обездвижен, позже возьмем его на абордаж!

languages.text: "Lord Cap'n, order the cannons to stand down. You can't board a heap of scrap metal, and we'll lose the tithe, too!"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, прикажите отставить огонь — металлолом на абордаж не возьмешь, да и десятина пропадет!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, order the cannons to stand down. You can't board a heap of scrap metal, and we'll lose the tithe, too!"
"Lord Captain, order the cannons to stand down. You can't board a heap of scrap metal, and we'll lose the tithe, too!"
"Lord Captain, order the cannons to stand down. You can't board a heap of scrap metal, and we'll lose the tithe, too!"
"Lord Captain, order the cannons to stand down. You can't board a heap of scrap metal, and we'll lose the tithe, too!"
"Lord Cap'n, order the cannons to stand down. You can't board a heap of scrap metal, and we'll lose the tithe, too!"
"Lord Cap'n, order the cannons to stand down. You can't board a heap of scrap metal, and we'll lose the tithe, too!"

languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, прикажите отставить огонь — металлолом на абордаж не возьмешь, да и десятина пропадет!"
「ロード・キャプテン、砲撃を停止させてください。スクラップの山に乗り込むわけにはいきませんし、租税もなくなりますよ！」
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, order the cannons to stand down. You can't board a heap of scrap metal, and we'll lose the tithe, too!"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、砲撃を停止させてください。スクラップの山に乗り込むわけにはいきませんし、租税もなくなりますよ！」

languages.text: "Lord Cap'n, befehlt den Kanonen, den Beschuss einzustellen. Einen Schrotthaufen kann man nicht betreten, und den Zehnt würden wir auch verlieren!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, order the cannons to stand down. You can't board a heap of scrap metal, and we'll lose the tithe, too!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Cap'n, befehlt den Kanonen, den Beschuss einzustellen. Einen Schrotthaufen kann man nicht betreten, und den Zehnt würden wir auch verlieren!"

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-cap'taine|Seigneure-cap'taine}, ordonnez aux cannons de se taire. Vous ne pouvez pas aborder un tas de ferraille et on y perdrait la dîme du même coup ! »
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, order the cannons to stand down. You can't board a heap of scrap metal, and we'll lose the tithe, too!"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-cap'taine|Seigneure-cap'taine}, ordonnez aux cannons de se taire. Vous ne pouvez pas aborder un tas de ferraille et on y perdrait la dîme du même coup ! »

languages.text: «Lord Capi, ordene a los cañones que cesen el fuego. ¡No puede abordar un montón de chatarra, y además perderemos el diezmo!».
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, order the cannons to stand down. You can't board a heap of scrap metal, and we'll lose the tithe, too!"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capi, ordene a los cañones que cesen el fuego. ¡No puede abordar un montón de chatarra, y además perderemos el diezmo!».

languages.text: “船长老大，快别再开炮了。要是把那艘船炸成一坨废铁，你就上不去了，什一税也都没了！”
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, order the cannons to stand down. You can't board a heap of scrap metal, and we'll lose the tithe, too!"

traits.locale_text: “船长老大，快别再开炮了。要是把那艘船炸成一坨废铁，你就上不去了，什一税也都没了！”

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, toplara ateş etmemelerini emredin. Hurda yığınına çıkartma yapamazsınız. Üstelik aşarı da kaybederiz!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, order the cannons to stand down. You can't board a heap of scrap metal, and we'll lose the tithe, too!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, toplara ateş etmemelerini emredin. Hurda yığınına çıkartma yapamazsınız. Üstelik aşarı da kaybederiz!"
